title: Welcome!
description: Overview course information for students enrolled in JHSPH Biostatistics 140.776 in Fall 2021
contents:
Welcome! I am very excited to have you in our one-term (half a semester) course on Statistical Computing course number (140.776) offered by the Department of Biostatistics at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health.
This course is designed for ScM and PhD students at Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health. We are usually pretty flexible about permitting outside students but we want everyone to be aware of the goals and assumptions so no one feels like they are surprised by how the class works.

The primary goal of the course is to teach you practical programming and computational skills required for the research and application of statistical methods.
